actions.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 262 - 158 (Roll no. 141).

description: Amendment prohibits a Federal official from entering into an international agreement concerning the disposal, management, and use of lands belonging to the United States unless specifically authorized by law.
purpose: An amendment numbered nine and printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit a Federal official from entering into an international agreement concerning the disposal, management, and use of lands belonging to the United States without Congressional approval.
